original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3471)@</color>武將側身揮砍手中的武器，對身邊的敵人以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3471)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>與<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3471)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>造成傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3471)@</color>The general slashed his weapon sideways, and used <color=#ccffcc> at the enemies around him. $Skill_Str(3471)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> and <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3471)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> hurt.
